00033 class KviWindow;
00034 class KviKvsModuleInterface;
00035 class KviKvsVariantList;

00037 #define KVI_KVS_NUM_RAW_EVENTS 1000
00038 
00039 class KVIRC_API KviKvsEventManager: public QObject
00040 {
00041         Q_OBJECT
00042         friend class KviModule; // compatibility only!
00043 protected: // it only can be created and destroyed by KviKvsAliasManager::init()/done()
00044         KviKvsEventManager();
00045         ~KviKvsEventManager();
00046 protected:
00047         static KviKvsEventManager * m_pInstance;
00048 
00049         static KviKvsEvent               m_appEventTable[KVI_KVS_NUM_APP_EVENTS];
00050         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * m_rawEventTable[KVI_KVS_NUM_RAW_EVENTS];
00051 public:
00052         static KviKvsEventManager * instance(){ return m_pInstance; };
00053         static void init(); // called by KviKvs::init()
00054         static void done(); // called by KviKvs::done()
00055 
00056         KviKvsEvent * appEvent(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return &(m_appEventTable[uEvIdx]); };
00057 
00058         bool hasAppHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].hasHandlers(); };
00059         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * appHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].handlers(); };
00060 
00061         bool hasRawHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_rawEventTable[uEvIdx]; };
00062         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * rawHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_rawEventTable[uEvIdx]; };
00063 
00064         KviKvsEvent * findAppEventByName(const QString &szName);
00065         unsigned int findAppEventIndexByName(const QString &szName);
00066         bool isValidAppEvent(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return (uEvIdx < KVI_KVS_NUM_APP_EVENTS); };
00067 
00068         bool isValidRawEvent(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return (uEvIdx < KVI_KVS_NUM_RAW_EVENTS); };
00069 
00070         bool addAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviKvsEventHandler * h);
00071         bool addRawHandler(unsigned int uRawIdx,KviKvsEventHandler * h);
00072 
00073         bool removeScriptAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00074         bool removeScriptRawHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00075 
00076         bool enableScriptAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName,bool bEnable);
00077         bool enableScriptRawHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName,bool bEnable);
00078 
00079         bool removeModuleAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00080         bool removeModuleRawHandler(unsigned int uRawIdx,KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00081 
00082         void removeAllModuleAppHandlers(KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00083         void removeAllModuleRawHandlers(KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00084 
00085         void removeAllModuleHandlers(KviKvsModuleInterface * i);
00086 
00087         KviKvsScriptEventHandler * findScriptRawHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00088         KviKvsScriptEventHandler * findScriptAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00089 
00090         // returns true if further processing should be stopped
00091         // none of these functions takes params ownership, so be sure to delete them !
00092         bool triggerHandlers(KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * pHandlers,KviWindow *pWnd,KviKvsVariantList *pParams);
00093         bool trigger(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviWindow * pWnd,KviKvsVariantList * pParams)
00094                 { return triggerHandlers(m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].handlers(),pWnd,pParams); };
00095         bool triggerRaw(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviWindow *pWnd,KviKvsVariantList * pParams)
00096                 { return triggerHandlers(m_rawEventTable[uEvIdx],pWnd,pParams); };
00097 
00098         // this is the only that takes parameter ownership and deletes them
00099         bool triggerDeleteParams(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviWindow * pWnd,KviKvsVariantList * pParams)
00100         {
00101                 bool bRet = triggerHandlers(m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].handlers(),pWnd,pParams);
00102                 delete pParams;
00103                 return bRet;
00104         };
00105 
00106         void removeAllScriptAppHandlers();
00107         void removeAllScriptRawHandlers();
00108 
00109         void clearAppEvents();
00110         void clearRawEvents();
00111         void clear();
00112 
00113         void loadAppEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00114         void saveAppEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00115         void loadRawEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00116         void saveRawEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00117 signals:
00118         void eventHandlerDisabled(const QString &);
00119 };
